tool_description: TrademarksSearch API and Realtime Status Tracker
name: Indian Trademarks Search API
title: Indian Trademarks Search API

api_list.name: trademark-details-and-status-check
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-trademarks-search-api.p.rapidapi.com/trademarks/5000000/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-trademarks-search-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-trademarks-search-api.p.rapidapi.com/trademarks/{application_number}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-trademarks-search-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: document-download

optional_parameters.name: document_id
optional_parameters.description: Document id, you can get from trademark details api

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Trademark Search API for Indian Trademarks

optional_parameters.name: word_mark
optional_parameters.description: Trademark's Word Mark eg, Apple, Startbucks, Google, etc.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records to skip. keep is multiplier of `limit` to get next pages.

optional_parameters.name: export
optional_parameters.description: For export all results to CSV, send "1" in export input, you'll get a link in "exported_url" key. Otherwise left it blank.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of records to fetch (1-100)

api_list.name: opposition-details-api

required_parameters.name: opposition_number
required_parameters.description: Get opposition_number by trademark details api

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-trademarks-search-api.p.rapidapi.com/oppositions/1102504/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-trademarks-search-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }
